Literature.Title: Novel D-form of hybrid peptide (D-AP19) rapidly kills Acinetobacter baumannii while tolerating proteolytic enzymes.
Literature.Author: Jariyarattanarach P, Klubthawee N, Wongchai M, Roytrakul S, Aunpad R

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=>250µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=125µg/ml),Escherichia coli O157:H7(MIC=250µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>250µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 13311(MIC=125µg/ml),Shigella sonnei ATCC 11060(MIC=250µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 11778(MIC=>250µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes 10403s(MIC=125µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>250µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=250µg/ml)
